attributes.action: "Place more Community Support Officers in neighbourhoods, ensuring a visable Police presence to aid detering crime and antisocial behaviour."
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In an age where elderly and middle aged adults are feeling increasingly uncomfortable even going to their local shops at both daytime and evening, a more visable policing presence would ensure this potentially vunarable group are aided in going about thier daily business without fear.
